title: Places We've Lived
name: Places We've Lived
description:
A Map by Bluenude3

Just a map of different places Garrett and I have lived over the years.

properties.name: 1974 - 1976 Garrett's 1st Home
properties.description: Posted by Bluenude3 fair haven, vtThis was the first place Garrett lived as a child.

properties.name: 1976 - 1979 Garrett's 2nd Fair Haven Home
properties.description: Posted by Bluenude3 28 Mechanics St, Fair Haven, VTThis was the second house Garrett lived in during his childhood.

properties.name: 1980 - 1986 Amalfi Cove, Austin House
properties.description: Posted by Bluenude3 This was the first house where we lived in Texas. Lots of great memories. Cutting Zak\'s hair, bedrooms tied together, and too many more to count.

properties.name: 1989-1991 Salisbury, Pennsylvania
properties.description: Posted by Bluenude3 salisbury, paBefore 6th grade my dad decided to go back for his Master\'s at Lehigh University. The family moved to PA. I don\'t remember much about this place as I was so young. I do recall getting into a fight because someone threw a snowball at my brother, running until coach told us to stop after loosing a soccer game, and ground bees and chipmonks in our yard out back.

properties.name: 1997 Wurzburg, Germany
properties.description: Posted by Bluenude3Durrbachtal 125 Unterdurrbach GermanyWhen I was young and in college at UT, I spent a summer abroad in Germany. I stayed at an apartment off Durrbachtal in Unterdurrbach, Germany. There was an pizza place called \'Al Capone\' and a bakery next door. A church across the street woke me with bells at 5am every morning. Good times. Laura (my roomate) and I essentially subsisted upon the local beer - Wurzburger Hofbrau - and orange Fanta, both of which we bought by the case from the liquor store down the street. The only black out to come out of this experience was when we toured the brewery, drunk... drunk... drunk!

properties.name: 1998 - 1999 Jamestown Apartments
properties.description: Posted by Bluenude3 4320 Bull Creek Rd, Austin, TxLived here with Crystal and later Mondo while going to UT. Nice townhomes, but I suck at dishes, trash, and recycling. Uppercrust bakery is the bakery to eat at around here. If you want good Omelette\'s you want The Omelettry. This was also Gourney\'s first home.

properties.name: 2002-2004 Our 1st Place
properties.description: Posted by Bluenude3 10909 Ridgeway Rd, Jonestown, TxThis was Garrett and I\'s first place. A tiny view of Lake Travis and a great place to start our lives together. Beautiful fireworks and lightening shows off the deck and hour plus commutes.

properties.name: 2004 - 2006 Rutland, VT
properties.description: Posted by Bluenude3 rutland, vtGarrett and I moved to Vermont to be closer to his family. This is our humble house that we lived in while here. This is also Picard\'s first home, where I lived while I completed my Art degree, and where I learned what "Peepers" were. Cara Mia\'s has great pizza, Sal\'s for Italian.

properties.name: Garrett's Childhood Home
properties.description: Posted by Bluenude3 fair haven, vtThis is the house where Garrett grew up. He walked to school and lived in the room in the basement. But it wasn\'t nearly as traumatic as it sounds! This is also where Fred was raised and Tara ate many a poisonious substance

properties.name: Grandparent Sage and Our House
properties.description: Posted by Bluenude3 Grandma and Grandpa Sage built this house and we moved into it in 1986. Too many memories to post. Lived there until UT and then moved back in after UT. Didn\'t move out until Garrett came along.

properties.name: The Cottage
properties.description: Posted by Bluenude3Union Springs, New YorkThis is where Zak and I spent the first few years of our lives and I burnt my butt on the woodstove. We also spent about 2 weeks every summer here, fishing and having marshmallows with grandma and grandpa.
